sn56.55:1.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahāpathaviyā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhipeyya.
sn56.55:1.3: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ—yā vā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā, ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī”ti?
sn56.55:1.4: “Etadeva, bhante, bahutaraṃ, yadidaṃ—mahāpathavī; appamattikā satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā.
sn56.55:1.5: Saṅkhampi na upenti, upanidhampi na upenti, kalabhāgampi na upenti mahāpathaviṃ upanidhāya satta kolaṭṭhimattiyo guḷikā upanikkhittā”ti.
